title: Doris Lessing
creator_credit: John Archer and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Well known writer Doris Lessing is interviewed about her life in Africa and the books she has written including “The grass is singing”, “The golden notebook”, “Briefing for a descent into hell”, and “Marriage between Zones 3,4 and 5”.
